scripts.watch-debug: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Webpack,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-webpack" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run serve-debug"
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-webpack && npm run build-ts && npm run lint && npm run copy-static-assets
scripts.build-prod: npm run clean && npm run build-webpack-prod && npm run build-ts && npm run lint && npm run copy-static-assets
scripts.watch: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Webpack,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-webpack" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run watch-node"
scripts.copy-static-assets: npm run html && npm run css && npm run assets
scripts.debug: npm run build && npm run watch-debug
scripts.agones:local: npm run build && (kubectl delete fleet --all || true) && eval $(minikube docker-env) && (docker image rmi playmoba:latest || true) && docker build -t playmoba . && kubectl apply -f kubeConfig/minikube/fleet.yaml && kubectl apply -f kubeConfig/minikube/autoscaler.yaml && kubectl apply -f kubeConfig/service.yaml
scripts.agones:prod: npm run build-prod && (kubectl delete fleet --all || true) && eval $(minikube docker-env) && docker build -t playmoba.azurecr.io/game-server . && docker push playmoba.azurecr.io/game-server && kubectl apply -f kubeConfig/aks/fleet.yaml && kubectl apply -f kubeConfig/aks/autoscaler.yaml && kubectl apply -f kubeConfig/service.yaml
